EmailTemplate.name: OHSU-EmailTemplate-Email Expiry Notification
EmailTemplate.Body:
Your team member $!idName's $!application Application's Account Email is about to expiry in a 7 days


Please find below the details for the user.

  • Username : $!idname
  • Application Name : $!application


If you have any queries, please reach out at IAMsuppport@ohsu.com


Best Regards
Your's OHSU Helpdesk
EmailTemplate.Description: Email template used to notify user with his Active Directory Credentials

Argument.name: idname
Argument.Description: The ID Name that new account is created for.

EmailTemplate.Subject: Email Expiry Notification Account Credentials For : $!idName
